description: Try our easy to follow Minted Lamb Skewers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Minted Lamb Skewers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together the minced lamb, curry powder and mint in a bowl and season to taste with salt and pepper. Using your hands, knead to combine the mixture evenly.

Divide the mixture into small sausages and thread evenly on to metal skewers. Cook under a preheated grill for 10 minutes, turning once. Serve hot with warmed naan bread, soured cream and a lime wedge. Sprinkle with chopped mint leaves and a little curry powder.
